name: mealplanner
description: A PWA for meal planning with local SQLite storage

scripts.build:fresh: rm -rf dist node_modules/.vite && npm run build:css && vite build
scripts.test:core: vitest src/test/unit/settings-manager.test.js src/test/unit/ingredients-manager.test.js src/test/unit/demo-data.test.js src/test/unit/recipe-manager.test.js src/test/unit/meal-rotation-engine.test.js src/test/unit/meal-engine-initialization.test.js src/test/unit/recipe-filtering.test.js src/test/unit/ui-improvements.test.js src/test/unit/recipe-dropdown-filtering.test.js src/test/unit/recipe-dropdown-ui.test.js src/test/unit/data-structure-regression.test.js
scripts.test:github: echo 'Set GITHUB_DEPLOY_KEY environment variable to test real GitHub Git operations' && vitest run src/test/integration/github-git-sync.test.js
scripts.test:github:real: test -n "$GITHUB_DEPLOY_KEY" && vitest run src/test/integration/github-git-sync.test.js || echo 'GITHUB_DEPLOY_KEY not set - skipping real Git tests'
scripts.test:e2e:timeout: timeout 60s playwright test || echo 'E2E tests timed out after 60s'
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all:fresh: npm run test:fresh && npm run test:e2e:fresh
scripts.test:all:timeout: npm run test:run && npm run test:e2e:timeout
scripts.restart: pkill -f vite || true && sleep 2 && npm run dev:fresh
scripts.version:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('index.html','utf8'); const versions=[...content.matchAll(/\.js\?v=([\d.]+)/g)].map(m=>m[1]); const unique=[...new Set(versions)]; console.log(unique.length===1 ? '✅ All versions consistent: '+unique[0] : '❌ Version mismatch: '+unique.join(', '));"
scripts.deploy:bust: npm run version:update && git add -A && git commit -m 'Cache bust: update version' && git push origin main
scripts.demo:favorites: node scripts/generate-demo-data.cjs --validate && echo 'Demo data regenerated with random favorites'
